https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/issues/3407

There are two JDBC connections, impala-JDBC and Hive-JDBC, and the Hive-JDBC connection is also used in the Cloudera test case (dolphin is currently using the same method). It is planned that the latter two can be supported.

---
impala 是有两种jdbc连接方式,使用impala-jdbc和hive-jdbc，在Cloudera 测试用例中也是使用hive-jdbc方式连接impala（dolphin目前也是这种）,规划是后面两种都可以支持
